'''''Non-Hidden Backup Energy Source''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Abducted Merchant in Chenyu Vale]]".

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is a reference to the Chinese animated series ''RoboWarriors: Adventures of Lolo'', created by BlueArc Animation and aired from 1998 to 1999. In this series, every robot has a "hidden backup energy source" reserved as final trump card, which is used to initiate self-destruct explosion in an attempt to take down enemies together with them.
